title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Boys, have you seen Kyle?! He's not at home.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Kyle went down to play in the basketball game, Mrs. Garrison.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: He's going to play basketball? Oh my God.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: What?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Well, ah I only made him look like he could play basketball. If he actually does it, the testicle in his knees will explode!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: What?! But you made him into a basketball player.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: No, I just made him look more like one. We have to stop him from playing! Those testicles in his knees are ticking time balls!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Oh Jesus! We've gotta get to my balls before Kyle hurts himself!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, night. The Star-Spangled Banner is being sung

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: ...and the home of the... brave!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Broflovski, be ready to take over for Owens.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: I'm a hundred percent ready, coach!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, by the restrooms in the hall. An usher stands nearby

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Eh excuse me, where, where is the bathroom for dolphins?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: We don't... have one.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Well where the hell am I supposed to go to the bathroom? I I need a large tank with salt water.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Ahhh- Too bad?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Damnit you people have to make special arrangements for transpecies people like me! I may be a dolphin, but I'm also a lawyer!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: You're a lawphin?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, outside, by the entrance. Mrs. Garrison, Dr. Biber and the boys approach the doors

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Tickets please.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: We don't have tickets!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Sorry ma'am, no tickets, no entry.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Look, there's a boy with my balls in his knees and he's in serious danger!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: What?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: My scrotum!  That dolphin has my scrotum! Now let us in!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: You can't go in, ma'am!  We have unauthorized entry on level one!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, courtside. The Colorado team drives to the opposite basket. The coach addresses Kyle

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: All right. Broflovski, you're going in next possession.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: All right!  Ow. Hm.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, by the restrooms. Mrs. Garrison and the others approach Gerald

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Gerald, where's Kyle?!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: What? Why??

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: My balls are in his knees. If he jumps with them they'll explode!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Oh my God!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: There they are, next to that dolphin!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Come on, we've gotta get to those balls!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Stop them! They didn't pay the two-dollar entry fee!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, courtside. Kyle has suited up and now enters the game.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Now substituting for Colorado, number 8, Kyle Broflovski.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Oh Jesus, he's about to play!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Mrs. Garrison, grab Kyle!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Which one is he??

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Hey, what the hell?!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Stop the game!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: I got it! I got the ball.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Kyle, NO!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Broflovski goes for the dunk!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: NO!  My baaaallllssss.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Denver Convention Center, outside. The police and paramedics have arrived and Kyle is sitting up on the gurney

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: So let me get this straight. That woman over there was trying to get to her balls which were in the knees of a black child whose father is a dolphin.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Yeah, that's basically it.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Sounds like an open and shut case. All right, let's head 'em out!

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: I'm sorry, Kyle, I should have told you the surgery was cosmetic only.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: So, does this mean I'm not really a dolphin?

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: Let's get you two up to the clinic and I'll change you back, for a nominal fee.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: But what about Mr. Garrison? He can't go back.

title: MR GARRISON S FANCY NEW VAGINA
text: You know what? I'm okay. Even though I'm not truly a woman, I think I still like the new me. I'd rather be a woman who can't have periods than a fag. Hey guys! This girl is staying a woman! Who wants to pound my vadge! Girl power!
